name: Hot Dogs Again...
description:
*current bug does not end the game at level 3*
We plan to fix this after the voting period

HOW TO PLAY
Complete as many orders as possible in the time limit!
Pro Tip: Throw out unused ingredients before picking up another

CONTROLS
Move and Climb: WASD 
Move Ladder: Left Shift
Interact with  Order: Space 
Throw away waste: Walk over to the Garbage can

To fix Franks Mistakes:
Add ingredients to orders with a +
-Pick Up Ingredient: Climb ladder and hover the ingredient
-Press space while next the the order

Remove ingredients from orders with a -
-Click on desired ingredient to remove
-Press space to close plate
